1387 bool QgsPalLayerSettings::checkMinimumSizeMM( const QgsRenderContext &ct, const QgsGeometry &geom, double minSize ) const
1388 {
1389  return QgsPalLabeling::checkMinimumSizeMM( ct, geom, minSize );
1390 }
1391 
1392 void QgsPalLayerSettings::calculateLabelSize( const QFontMetricsF *fm, const QString &text, double &labelX, double &labelY, const QgsFeature *f, QgsRenderContext *context, double *rotatedLabelX, double *rotatedLabelY )
1393 {
1394  if ( !fm || !f )
1395  {
1396  return;
1397  }
1398 
1399  QString textCopy( text );
1400 
1401  //try to keep < 2.12 API - handle no passed render context
1402  std::unique_ptr< QgsRenderContext > scopedRc;
1403  if ( !context )
1404  {
1405  scopedRc.reset( new QgsRenderContext() );
1406  if ( f )
1407  scopedRc->expressionContext().setFeature( *f );
1408  }
1409  QgsRenderContext *rc = context ? context : scopedRc.get();
1410 
1411  QString wrapchr = wrapChar;
1412  int evalAutoWrapLength = autoWrapLength;
1413  double multilineH = mFormat.lineHeight();
1414  QgsTextFormat::TextOrientation orientation = mFormat.orientation();
1415 
1416  bool addDirSymb = addDirectionSymbol;
1417  QString leftDirSymb = leftDirectionSymbol;
1418  QString rightDirSymb = rightDirectionSymbol;
1419  QgsPalLayerSettings::DirectionSymbols placeDirSymb = placeDirectionSymbol;
1420 
1421  if ( f == mCurFeat ) // called internally, use any stored data defined values
1422  {
1423  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineWrapChar ) )
1424  {
1425  wrapchr = dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineWrapChar ).toString();
1426  }
1427 
1428  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::AutoWrapLength ) )
1429  {
1430  evalAutoWrapLength = dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::AutoWrapLength, evalAutoWrapLength ).toInt();
1431  }
1432 
1433  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineHeight ) )
1434  {
1435  multilineH = dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineHeight ).toDouble();
1436  }
1437 
1438  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation ) )
1439  {
1440  orientation = QgsTextRendererUtils::decodeTextOrientation( dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation ).toString() );
1441  }
1442 
1443  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbDraw ) )
1444  {
1445  addDirSymb = dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbDraw ).toBool();
1446  }
1447 
1448  if ( addDirSymb )
1449  {
1450 
1451  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbLeft ) )
1452  {
1453  leftDirSymb = dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbLeft ).toString();
1454  }
1455  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbRight ) )
1456  {
1457  rightDirSymb = dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbRight ).toString();
1458  }
1459 
1460  if ( dataDefinedValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement ) )
1461  {
1462  placeDirSymb = static_cast< QgsPalLayerSettings::DirectionSymbols >( dataDefinedValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement ).toInt() );
1463  }
1464 
1465  }
1466 
1467  }
1468  else // called externally with passed-in feature, evaluate data defined
1469  {
1470  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineWrapChar ) )
1471  {
1472  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( wrapChar );
1473  wrapchr = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineWrapChar, rc->expressionContext(), wrapchr ).toString();
1474  }
1475 
1476  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::AutoWrapLength ) )
1477  {
1478  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( evalAutoWrapLength );
1479  evalAutoWrapLength = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::AutoWrapLength, rc->expressionContext(), evalAutoWrapLength ).toInt();
1480  }
1481 
1482  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineHeight ) )
1483  {
1484  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( multilineH );
1485  multilineH = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineHeight, rc->expressionContext(), multilineH );
1486  }
1487 
1488  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation ) )
1489  {
1490  QString encoded = QgsTextRendererUtils::encodeTextOrientation( orientation );
1491  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( encoded );
1492  orientation = QgsTextRendererUtils::decodeTextOrientation( mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsString( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation, rc->expressionContext(), encoded ) );
1493  }
1494 
1495  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbDraw ) )
1496  {
1497  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( addDirSymb );
1498  addDirSymb = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbDraw, rc->expressionContext(), addDirSymb );
1499  }
1500 
1501  if ( addDirSymb ) // don't do extra evaluations if not adding a direction symbol
1502  {
1503  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbLeft ) )
1504  {
1505  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( leftDirSymb );
1506  leftDirSymb = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbLeft, rc->expressionContext(), leftDirSymb ).toString();
1507  }
1508 
1509  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbRight ) )
1510  {
1511  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( rightDirSymb );
1512  rightDirSymb = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbRight, rc->expressionContext(), rightDirSymb ).toString();
1513  }
1514 
1515  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement ) )
1516  {
1517  rc->expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( static_cast< int >( placeDirSymb ) );
1518  placeDirSymb = static_cast< QgsPalLayerSettings::DirectionSymbols >( mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsInt( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement, rc->expressionContext(), placeDirSymb ) );
1519  }
1520  }
1521  }
1522 
1523  if ( wrapchr.isEmpty() )
1524  {
1525  wrapchr = QStringLiteral( "\n" ); // default to new line delimiter
1526  }
1527 
1528  //consider the space needed for the direction symbol
1529  if ( addDirSymb && placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::Line
1530  && ( !leftDirSymb.isEmpty() || !rightDirSymb.isEmpty() ) )
1531  {
1532  QString dirSym = leftDirSymb;
1533 
1534  if ( fm->width( rightDirSymb ) > fm->width( dirSym ) )
1535  dirSym = rightDirSymb;
1536 
1537  if ( placeDirSymb == QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolLeftRight )
1538  {
1539  textCopy.append( dirSym );
1540  }
1541  else
1542  {
1543  textCopy.prepend( dirSym + QStringLiteral( "\n" ) ); // SymbolAbove or SymbolBelow
1544  }
1545  }
1546 
1547  double w = 0.0, h = 0.0, rw = 0.0, rh = 0.0;
1548  double labelHeight = fm->ascent() + fm->descent(); // ignore +1 for baseline
1549  const QStringList multiLineSplit = QgsPalLabeling::splitToLines( textCopy, wrapchr, evalAutoWrapLength, useMaxLineLengthForAutoWrap );
1550  int lines = multiLineSplit.size();
1551 
1552  switch ( orientation )
1553  {
1554  case QgsTextFormat::HorizontalOrientation:
1555  {
1556  h += fm->height() + static_cast< double >( ( lines - 1 ) * labelHeight * multilineH );
1557 
1558  for ( const auto &line : multiLineSplit )
1559  {
1560  w = std::max( w, fm->width( line ) );
1561  }
1562  break;
1563  }
1564 
1565  case QgsTextFormat::VerticalOrientation:
1566  {
1567  double letterSpacing = mFormat.scaledFont( *context ).letterSpacing();
1568  double labelWidth = fm->maxWidth();
1569  w = labelWidth + ( lines - 1 ) * labelWidth * multilineH;
1570 
1571  int maxLineLength = 0;
1572  for ( const auto &line : multiLineSplit )
1573  {
1574  maxLineLength = std::max( maxLineLength, line.length() );
1575  }
1576  h = fm->ascent() * maxLineLength + ( maxLineLength - 1 ) * letterSpacing;
1577  break;
1578  }
1579 
1580  case QgsTextFormat::RotationBasedOrientation:
1581  {
1582  double widthHorizontal = 0.0;
1583  for ( const auto &line : multiLineSplit )
1584  {
1585  widthHorizontal = std::max( w, fm->width( line ) );
1586  }
1587 
1588  double widthVertical = 0.0;
1589  double letterSpacing = mFormat.scaledFont( *context ).letterSpacing();
1590  double labelWidth = fm->maxWidth();
1591  widthVertical = labelWidth + ( lines - 1 ) * labelWidth * multilineH;
1592 
1593  double heightHorizontal = 0.0;
1594  heightHorizontal += fm->height() + static_cast< double >( ( lines - 1 ) * labelHeight * multilineH );
1595 
1596  double heightVertical = 0.0;
1597  int maxLineLength = 0;
1598  for ( const auto &line : multiLineSplit )
1599  {
1600  maxLineLength = std::max( maxLineLength, line.length() );
1601  }
1602  heightVertical = fm->ascent() * maxLineLength + ( maxLineLength - 1 ) * letterSpacing;
1603 
1604  w = widthHorizontal;
1605  rw = heightVertical;
1606  h = heightHorizontal;
1607  rh = widthVertical;
1608  break;
1609  }
1610  }
1611 
1612 #if 0 // XXX strk
1613  QgsPointXY ptSize = xform->toMapCoordinatesF( w, h );
1614  labelX = std::fabs( ptSize.x() - ptZero.x() );
1615  labelY = std::fabs( ptSize.y() - ptZero.y() );
1616 #else
1617  double uPP = xform->mapUnitsPerPixel();
1618  labelX = w * uPP;
1619  labelY = h * uPP;
1620  if ( rotatedLabelX && rotatedLabelY )
1621  {
1622  *rotatedLabelX = rw * uPP;
1623  *rotatedLabelY = rh * uPP;
1624  }
1625 #endif
1626 }
1627 
1628 void QgsPalLayerSettings::registerFeature( const QgsFeature &f, QgsRenderContext &context, QgsLabelFeature **labelFeature, QgsGeometry obstacleGeometry, const QgsSymbol *symbol )
1629 {
1630  // either used in QgsPalLabeling (palLayer is set) or in QgsLabelingEngine (labelFeature is set)
1631  Q_ASSERT( labelFeature );
1632 
1633  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
1634  mCurFeat = &f;
1635 
1636  // data defined is obstacle? calculate this first, to avoid wasting time working with obstacles we don't require
1637  bool isObstacle = obstacle;
1638  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::IsObstacle ) )
1639  isObstacle = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::IsObstacle, context.expressionContext(), obstacle ); // default to layer default
1640 
1641  if ( !drawLabels )
1642  {
1643  if ( isObstacle )
1644  {
1645  registerObstacleFeature( f, context, labelFeature, obstacleGeometry );
1646  }
1647  return;
1648  }
1649 
1650  QgsFeature feature = f;
1651  if ( geometryGeneratorEnabled )
1652  {
1653  const QgsGeometry geometry = mGeometryGeneratorExpression.evaluate( &context.expressionContext() ).value<QgsGeometry>();
1654  if ( mGeometryGeneratorExpression.hasEvalError() )
1655  QgsMessageLog::logMessage( mGeometryGeneratorExpression.evalErrorString(), QObject::tr( "Labeling" ) );
1656 
1657  if ( obstacleGeometry.isNull() )
1658  {
1659  // if an explicit obstacle geometry hasn't been set, we must always use the original feature geometry
1660  // as the obstacle -- because we want to use the geometry which was used to render the symbology
1661  // for the feature as the obstacle for other layers' labels, NOT the generated geometry which is used
1662  // only to place labels for this layer.
1663  obstacleGeometry = f.geometry();
1664  }
1665 
1666  feature.setGeometry( geometry );
1667  }
1668 
1669  // store data defined-derived values for later adding to label feature for use during rendering
1670  dataDefinedValues.clear();
1671 
1672  // data defined show label? defaults to show label if not set
1673  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Show ) )
1674  {
1675  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( true );
1676  if ( !mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::Show, context.expressionContext(), true ) )
1677  {
1678  return;
1679  }
1680  }
1681 
1682  // data defined scale visibility?
1683  bool useScaleVisibility = scaleVisibility;
1684  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::ScaleVisibility ) )
1685  useScaleVisibility = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::ScaleVisibility, context.expressionContext(), scaleVisibility );
1686 
1687  if ( useScaleVisibility )
1688  {
1689  // data defined min scale?
1690  double maxScale = maximumScale;
1691  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::MaximumScale ) )
1692  {
1693  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( maximumScale );
1694  maxScale = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::MaximumScale, context.expressionContext(), maxScale );
1695  }
1696 
1697  // scales closer than 1:1
1698  if ( maxScale < 0 )
1699  {
1700  maxScale = 1 / std::fabs( maxScale );
1701  }
1702 
1703  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( maxScale, 0.0 ) && context.rendererScale() < maxScale )
1704  {
1705  return;
1706  }
1707 
1708  // data defined min scale?
1709  double minScale = minimumScale;
1710  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::MinimumScale ) )
1711  {
1712  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( minimumScale );
1713  minScale = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::MinimumScale, context.expressionContext(), minScale );
1714  }
1715 
1716  // scales closer than 1:1
1717  if ( minScale < 0 )
1718  {
1719  minScale = 1 / std::fabs( minScale );
1720  }
1721 
1722  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( minScale, 0.0 ) && context.rendererScale() > minScale )
1723  {
1724  return;
1725  }
1726  }
1727 
1728  QFont labelFont = mFormat.font();
1729  // labelFont will be added to label feature for use during label painting
1730 
1731  // data defined font units?
1732  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit fontunits = mFormat.sizeUnit();
1733  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontSizeUnit, context.expressionContext() );
1734  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
1735  {
1736  QString units = exprVal.toString();
1737  if ( !units.isEmpty() )
1738  {
1739  bool ok;
1740  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit res = QgsUnitTypes::decodeRenderUnit( units, &ok );
1741  if ( ok )
1742  fontunits = res;
1743  }
1744  }
1745 
1746  //data defined label size?
1747  double fontSize = mFormat.size();
1748  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Size ) )
1749  {
1750  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( fontSize );
1751  fontSize = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::Size, context.expressionContext(), fontSize );
1752  }
1753  if ( fontSize <= 0.0 )
1754  {
1755  return;
1756  }
1757 
1758  int fontPixelSize = QgsTextRenderer::sizeToPixel( fontSize, context, fontunits, mFormat.sizeMapUnitScale() );
1759  // don't try to show font sizes less than 1 pixel (Qt complains)
1760  if ( fontPixelSize < 1 )
1761  {
1762  return;
1763  }
1764  labelFont.setPixelSize( fontPixelSize );
1765 
1766  // NOTE: labelFont now always has pixelSize set, so pointSize or pointSizeF might return -1
1767 
1768  // defined 'minimum/maximum pixel font size'?
1769  if ( fontunits == QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnits )
1770  {
1771  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontLimitPixel, context.expressionContext(), fontLimitPixelSize ) )
1772  {
1773  int fontMinPixel = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsInt( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontMinPixel, context.expressionContext(), fontMinPixelSize );
1774  int fontMaxPixel = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsInt( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontMaxPixel, context.expressionContext(), fontMaxPixelSize );
1775 
1776  if ( fontMinPixel > labelFont.pixelSize() || labelFont.pixelSize() > fontMaxPixel )
1777  {
1778  return;
1779  }
1780  }
1781  }
1782 
1783  // NOTE: the following parsing functions calculate and store any data defined values for later use in QgsPalLabeling::drawLabeling
1784  // this is done to provide clarity, and because such parsing is not directly related to PAL feature registration calculations
1785 
1786  // calculate rest of font attributes and store any data defined values
1787  // this is done here for later use in making label backgrounds part of collision management (when implemented)
1788  labelFont.setCapitalization( QFont::MixedCase ); // reset this - we don't use QFont's handling as it breaks with curved labels
1789  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.hasActiveProperties() )
1790  {
1791  parseTextStyle( labelFont, fontunits, context );
1792  parseTextFormatting( context );
1793  parseTextBuffer( context );
1794  parseShapeBackground( context );
1795  parseDropShadow( context );
1796  }
1797 
1798  QString labelText;
1799 
1800  // Check to see if we are a expression string.
1801  if ( isExpression )
1802  {
1803  QgsExpression *exp = getLabelExpression();
1804  if ( exp->hasParserError() )
1805  {
1806  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "Expression parser error:%1" ).arg( exp->parserErrorString() ), 4 );
1807  return;
1808  }
1809 
1810  QVariant result = exp->evaluate( &context.expressionContext() ); // expression prepared in QgsPalLabeling::prepareLayer()
1811  if ( exp->hasEvalError() )
1812  {
1813  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "Expression parser eval error:%1" ).arg( exp->evalErrorString() ), 4 );
1814  return;
1815  }
1816  labelText = result.isNull() ? QString() : result.toString();
1817  }
1818  else
1819  {
1820  const QVariant &v = feature.attribute( fieldIndex );
1821  labelText = v.isNull() ? QString() : v.toString();
1822  }
1823 
1824  // apply text replacements
1825  if ( useSubstitutions )
1826  {
1827  labelText = substitutions.process( labelText );
1828  }
1829 
1830  // apply capitalization
1831  QgsStringUtils::Capitalization capitalization = QgsStringUtils::MixedCase;
1832  // maintain API - capitalization may have been set in textFont
1833  if ( mFormat.font().capitalization() != QFont::MixedCase )
1834  {
1835  capitalization = static_cast< QgsStringUtils::Capitalization >( mFormat.font().capitalization() );
1836  }
1837  // data defined font capitalization?
1838  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontCase ) )
1839  {
1840  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontCase, context.expressionContext() );
1841  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
1842  {
1843  QString fcase = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
1844  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal FontCase:%1" ).arg( fcase ), 4 );
1845 
1846  if ( !fcase.isEmpty() )
1847  {
1848  if ( fcase.compare( QLatin1String( "NoChange" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
1849  {
1850  capitalization = QgsStringUtils::MixedCase;
1851  }
1852  else if ( fcase.compare( QLatin1String( "Upper" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
1853  {
1854  capitalization = QgsStringUtils::AllUppercase;
1855  }
1856  else if ( fcase.compare( QLatin1String( "Lower" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
1857  {
1858  capitalization = QgsStringUtils::AllLowercase;
1859  }
1860  else if ( fcase.compare( QLatin1String( "Capitalize" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
1861  {
1862  capitalization = QgsStringUtils::ForceFirstLetterToCapital;
1863  }
1864  }
1865  }
1866  }
1867  labelText = QgsStringUtils::capitalize( labelText, capitalization );
1868 
1869  // format number if label text is coercible to a number
1870  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::NumFormat ) && mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::NumFormat, context.expressionContext(), formatNumbers ) )
1871  {
1872  // data defined decimal places?
1873  int decimalPlaces = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsInt( QgsPalLayerSettings::NumDecimals, context.expressionContext(), decimals );
1874  if ( decimalPlaces <= 0 ) // needs to be positive
1875  decimalPlaces = decimals;
1876 
1877  // data defined plus sign?
1878  bool signPlus = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::NumPlusSign, context.expressionContext(), plusSign );
1879 
1880  QVariant textV( labelText );
1881  bool ok;
1882  double d = textV.toDouble( &ok );
1883  if ( ok )
1884  {
1885  QString numberFormat;
1886  if ( d > 0 && signPlus )
1887  {
1888  numberFormat.append( '+' );
1889  }
1890  numberFormat.append( "%1" );
1891  labelText = numberFormat.arg( d, 0, 'f', decimalPlaces );
1892  }
1893  }
1894 
1895  // NOTE: this should come AFTER any option that affects font metrics
1896  std::unique_ptr<QFontMetricsF> labelFontMetrics( new QFontMetricsF( labelFont ) );
1897  double labelX, labelY, rotatedLabelX, rotatedLabelY; // will receive label size
1898  calculateLabelSize( labelFontMetrics.get(), labelText, labelX, labelY, mCurFeat, &context, &rotatedLabelX, &rotatedLabelY );
1899 
1900 
1901  // maximum angle between curved label characters (hardcoded defaults used in QGIS <2.0)
1902  //
1903  double maxcharanglein = 20.0; // range 20.0-60.0
1904  double maxcharangleout = -20.0; // range 20.0-95.0
1905 
1906  if ( placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::Curved || placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::PerimeterCurved )
1907  {
1908  maxcharanglein = maxCurvedCharAngleIn;
1909  maxcharangleout = maxCurvedCharAngleOut;
1910 
1911  //data defined maximum angle between curved label characters?
1912  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::CurvedCharAngleInOut ) )
1913  {
1914  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::CurvedCharAngleInOut, context.expressionContext() );
1915  bool ok = false;
1916  const QPointF maxcharanglePt = QgsSymbolLayerUtils::toPoint( exprVal, &ok );
1917  if ( ok )
1918  {
1919  maxcharanglein = qBound( 20.0, static_cast< double >( maxcharanglePt.x() ), 60.0 );
1920  maxcharangleout = qBound( 20.0, static_cast< double >( maxcharanglePt.y() ), 95.0 );
1921  }
1922  }
1923  // make sure maxcharangleout is always negative
1924  maxcharangleout = -( std::fabs( maxcharangleout ) );
1925  }
1926 
1927  // data defined centroid whole or clipped?
1928  bool wholeCentroid = centroidWhole;
1929  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::CentroidWhole ) )
1930  {
1931  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::CentroidWhole, context.expressionContext() );
1932  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
1933  {
1934  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
1935  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal CentroidWhole:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
1936 
1937  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
1938  {
1939  if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Visible" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
1940  {
1941  wholeCentroid = false;
1942  }
1943  else if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Whole" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
1944  {
1945  wholeCentroid = true;
1946  }
1947  }
1948  }
1949  }
1950 
1951  QgsGeometry geom = feature.geometry();
1952  if ( geom.isNull() )
1953  {
1954  return;
1955  }
1956 
1957  // simplify?
1958  const QgsVectorSimplifyMethod &simplifyMethod = context.vectorSimplifyMethod();
1959  std::unique_ptr<QgsGeometry> scopedClonedGeom;
1960  if ( simplifyMethod.simplifyHints() != QgsVectorSimplifyMethod::NoSimplification && simplifyMethod.forceLocalOptimization() )
1961  {
1962  unsigned int simplifyHints = simplifyMethod.simplifyHints() | QgsMapToPixelSimplifier::SimplifyEnvelope;
1963  QgsMapToPixelSimplifier::SimplifyAlgorithm simplifyAlgorithm = static_cast< QgsMapToPixelSimplifier::SimplifyAlgorithm >( simplifyMethod.simplifyAlgorithm() );
1964  QgsGeometry g = geom;
1965  QgsMapToPixelSimplifier simplifier( simplifyHints, simplifyMethod.tolerance(), simplifyAlgorithm );
1966  geom = simplifier.simplify( geom );
1967  }
1968 
1969  // whether we're going to create a centroid for polygon
1970  bool centroidPoly = ( ( placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::AroundPoint
1971  || placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::OverPoint )
1972  && geom.type() == QgsWkbTypes::PolygonGeometry );
1973 
1974  // CLIP the geometry if it is bigger than the extent
1975  // don't clip if centroid is requested for whole feature
1976  bool doClip = false;
1977  if ( !centroidPoly || !wholeCentroid )
1978  {
1979  doClip = true;
1980  }
1981 
1982  // if using fitInPolygonOnly option, generate the permissible zone (must happen before geometry is modified - e.g.,
1983  // as a result of using perimeter based labeling and the geometry is converted to a boundary)
1984  QgsGeometry permissibleZone;
1985  if ( geom.type() == QgsWkbTypes::PolygonGeometry && fitInPolygonOnly )
1986  {
1987  permissibleZone = geom;
1988  if ( QgsPalLabeling::geometryRequiresPreparation( permissibleZone, context, ct, doClip ? extentGeom : QgsGeometry(), mergeLines ) )
1989  {
1990  permissibleZone = QgsPalLabeling::prepareGeometry( permissibleZone, context, ct, doClip ? extentGeom : QgsGeometry(), mergeLines );
1991  }
1992  }
1993 
1994  // if using perimeter based labeling for polygons, get the polygon's
1995  // linear boundary and use that for the label geometry
1996  if ( ( geom.type() == QgsWkbTypes::PolygonGeometry )
1997  && ( placement == Line || placement == PerimeterCurved ) )
1998  {
1999  geom = QgsGeometry( geom.constGet()->boundary() );
2000  }
2001 
2002  geos::unique_ptr geos_geom_clone;
2003  if ( QgsPalLabeling::geometryRequiresPreparation( geom, context, ct, doClip ? extentGeom : QgsGeometry(), mergeLines ) )
2004  {
2005  geom = QgsPalLabeling::prepareGeometry( geom, context, ct, doClip ? extentGeom : QgsGeometry(), mergeLines );
2006 
2007  if ( geom.isNull() )
2008  return;
2009  }
2010  geos_geom_clone = QgsGeos::asGeos( geom );
2011 
2012  if ( isObstacle )
2013  {
2014  if ( !obstacleGeometry.isNull() && QgsPalLabeling::geometryRequiresPreparation( obstacleGeometry, context, ct, doClip ? extentGeom : QgsGeometry(), mergeLines ) )
2015  {
2016  obstacleGeometry = QgsGeometry( QgsPalLabeling::prepareGeometry( obstacleGeometry, context, ct, doClip ? extentGeom : QgsGeometry(), mergeLines ) );
2017  }
2018  }
2019 
2020  if ( minFeatureSize > 0 && !checkMinimumSizeMM( context, geom, minFeatureSize ) )
2021  return;
2022 
2023  if ( !geos_geom_clone )
2024  return; // invalid geometry
2025 
2026  // likelihood exists label will be registered with PAL and may be drawn
2027  // check if max number of features to label (already registered with PAL) has been reached
2028  // Debug output at end of QgsPalLabeling::drawLabeling(), when deleting temp geometries
2029  if ( limitNumLabels )
2030  {
2031  if ( !maxNumLabels )
2032  {
2033  return;
2034  }
2035  if ( mFeatsRegPal >= maxNumLabels )
2036  {
2037  return;
2038  }
2039 
2040  int divNum = static_cast< int >( ( static_cast< double >( mFeaturesToLabel ) / maxNumLabels ) + 0.5 ); // NOLINT
2041  if ( divNum && ( mFeatsRegPal == static_cast< int >( mFeatsSendingToPal / divNum ) ) )
2042  {
2043  mFeatsSendingToPal += 1;
2044  if ( divNum && mFeatsSendingToPal % divNum )
2045  {
2046  return;
2047  }
2048  }
2049  }
2050 
2051  geos::unique_ptr geosObstacleGeomClone;
2052  if ( isObstacle && !obstacleGeometry.isNull() )
2053  {
2054  geosObstacleGeomClone = QgsGeos::asGeos( obstacleGeometry );
2055  }
2056 
2057 
2058  //data defined position / alignment / rotation?
2059  bool dataDefinedPosition = false;
2060  bool layerDefinedRotation = false;
2061  bool dataDefinedRotation = false;
2062  double xPos = 0.0, yPos = 0.0, angle = 0.0;
2063  bool ddXPos = false, ddYPos = false;
2064  double quadOffsetX = 0.0, quadOffsetY = 0.0;
2065  double offsetX = 0.0, offsetY = 0.0;
2066 
2067  //data defined quadrant offset?
2068  bool ddFixedQuad = false;
2069  QuadrantPosition quadOff = quadOffset;
2070  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::OffsetQuad ) )
2071  {
2072  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( static_cast< int >( quadOff ) );
2073  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::OffsetQuad, context.expressionContext() );
2074  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2075  {
2076  bool ok;
2077  int quadInt = exprVal.toInt( &ok );
2078  if ( ok && 0 <= quadInt && quadInt <= 8 )
2079  {
2080  quadOff = static_cast< QuadrantPosition >( quadInt );
2081  ddFixedQuad = true;
2082  }
2083  }
2084  }
2085 
2086  // adjust quadrant offset of labels
2087  switch ( quadOff )
2088  {
2089  case QuadrantAboveLeft:
2090  quadOffsetX = -1.0;
2091  quadOffsetY = 1.0;
2092  break;
2093  case QuadrantAbove:
2094  quadOffsetX = 0.0;
2095  quadOffsetY = 1.0;
2096  break;
2097  case QuadrantAboveRight:
2098  quadOffsetX = 1.0;
2099  quadOffsetY = 1.0;
2100  break;
2101  case QuadrantLeft:
2102  quadOffsetX = -1.0;
2103  quadOffsetY = 0.0;
2104  break;
2105  case QuadrantRight:
2106  quadOffsetX = 1.0;
2107  quadOffsetY = 0.0;
2108  break;
2109  case QuadrantBelowLeft:
2110  quadOffsetX = -1.0;
2111  quadOffsetY = -1.0;
2112  break;
2113  case QuadrantBelow:
2114  quadOffsetX = 0.0;
2115  quadOffsetY = -1.0;
2116  break;
2117  case QuadrantBelowRight:
2118  quadOffsetX = 1.0;
2119  quadOffsetY = -1.0;
2120  break;
2121  case QuadrantOver:
2122  break;
2123  }
2124 
2125  //data defined label offset?
2126  double xOff = xOffset;
2127  double yOff = yOffset;
2128  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::OffsetXY ) )
2129  {
2130  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( QgsSymbolLayerUtils::encodePoint( QPointF( xOffset, yOffset ) ) );
2131  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::OffsetXY, context.expressionContext() );
2132  bool ok = false;
2133  const QPointF ddOffPt = QgsSymbolLayerUtils::toPoint( exprVal, &ok );
2134  if ( ok )
2135  {
2136  xOff = ddOffPt.x();
2137  yOff = ddOffPt.y();
2138  }
2139  }
2140 
2141  // data defined label offset units?
2142  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit offUnit = offsetUnits;
2143  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::OffsetUnits ) )
2144  {
2145  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::OffsetUnits, context.expressionContext() );
2146  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2147  {
2148  QString units = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2149  if ( !units.isEmpty() )
2150  {
2151  bool ok = false;
2152  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit decodedUnits = QgsUnitTypes::decodeRenderUnit( units, &ok );
2153  if ( ok )
2154  {
2155  offUnit = decodedUnits;
2156  }
2157  }
2158  }
2159  }
2160 
2161  // adjust offset of labels to match chosen unit and map scale
2162  // offsets match those of symbology: -x = left, -y = up
2163  offsetX = context.convertToMapUnits( xOff, offUnit, labelOffsetMapUnitScale );
2164  // must be negative to match symbology offset direction
2165  offsetY = context.convertToMapUnits( -yOff, offUnit, labelOffsetMapUnitScale );
2166 
2167  // layer defined rotation?
2168  // only rotate non-pinned OverPoint placements until other placements are supported in pal::Feature
2169  if ( placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::OverPoint && !qgsDoubleNear( angleOffset, 0.0 ) )
2170  {
2171  layerDefinedRotation = true;
2172  angle = ( 360 - angleOffset ) * M_PI / 180; // convert to radians counterclockwise
2173  }
2174 
2175  const QgsMapToPixel &m2p = context.mapToPixel();
2176  //data defined rotation?
2177  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::LabelRotation ) )
2178  {
2179  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( angleOffset );
2180  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::LabelRotation, context.expressionContext() );
2181  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2182  {
2183  bool ok;
2184  double rotD = exprVal.toDouble( &ok );
2185  if ( ok )
2186  {
2187  dataDefinedRotation = true;
2188  // TODO: add setting to disable having data defined rotation follow
2189  // map rotation ?
2190  rotD += m2p.mapRotation();
2191  angle = ( 360 - rotD ) * M_PI / 180.0;
2192  }
2193  }
2194  }
2195 
2196  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::PositionX ) )
2197  {
2198  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::PositionX, context.expressionContext() );
2199  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2200  {
2201  if ( !exprVal.isNull() )
2202  xPos = exprVal.toDouble( &ddXPos );
2203 
2204  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::PositionY ) )
2205  {
2206  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::PositionY, context.expressionContext() );
2207  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2208  {
2209  //data defined position. But field values could be NULL -> positions will be generated by PAL
2210  if ( !exprVal.isNull() )
2211  yPos = exprVal.toDouble( &ddYPos );
2212 
2213  if ( ddXPos && ddYPos )
2214  {
2215  dataDefinedPosition = true;
2216  // layer rotation set, but don't rotate pinned labels unless data defined
2217  if ( layerDefinedRotation && !dataDefinedRotation )
2218  {
2219  angle = 0.0;
2220  }
2221 
2222  //x/y shift in case of alignment
2223  double xdiff = 0.0;
2224  double ydiff = 0.0;
2225 
2226  //horizontal alignment
2227  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Hali ) )
2228  {
2229  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::Hali, context.expressionContext() );
2230  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2231  {
2232  QString haliString = exprVal.toString();
2233  if ( haliString.compare( QLatin1String( "Center" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2234  {
2235  xdiff -= labelX / 2.0;
2236  }
2237  else if ( haliString.compare( QLatin1String( "Right" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2238  {
2239  xdiff -= labelX;
2240  }
2241  }
2242  }
2243 
2244  //vertical alignment
2245  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Vali ) )
2246  {
2247  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::Vali, context.expressionContext() );
2248  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2249  {
2250  QString valiString = exprVal.toString();
2251  if ( valiString.compare( QLatin1String( "Bottom" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) != 0 )
2252  {
2253  if ( valiString.compare( QLatin1String( "Top" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2254  {
2255  ydiff -= labelY;
2256  }
2257  else
2258  {
2259  double descentRatio = labelFontMetrics->descent() / labelFontMetrics->height();
2260  if ( valiString.compare( QLatin1String( "Base" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2261  {
2262  ydiff -= labelY * descentRatio;
2263  }
2264  else //'Cap' or 'Half'
2265  {
2266  double capHeightRatio = ( labelFontMetrics->boundingRect( 'H' ).height() + 1 + labelFontMetrics->descent() ) / labelFontMetrics->height();
2267  ydiff -= labelY * capHeightRatio;
2268  if ( valiString.compare( QLatin1String( "Half" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2269  {
2270  ydiff += labelY * ( capHeightRatio - descentRatio ) / 2.0;
2271  }
2272  }
2273  }
2274  }
2275  }
2276  }
2277 
2278  if ( dataDefinedRotation )
2279  {
2280  //adjust xdiff and ydiff because the hali/vali point needs to be the rotation center
2281  double xd = xdiff * std::cos( angle ) - ydiff * std::sin( angle );
2282  double yd = xdiff * std::sin( angle ) + ydiff * std::cos( angle );
2283  xdiff = xd;
2284  ydiff = yd;
2285  }
2286 
2287  //project xPos and yPos from layer to map CRS, handle rotation
2288  QgsGeometry ddPoint( new QgsPoint( xPos, yPos ) );
2289  if ( QgsPalLabeling::geometryRequiresPreparation( ddPoint, context, ct ) )
2290  {
2291  ddPoint = QgsPalLabeling::prepareGeometry( ddPoint, context, ct );
2292  xPos = static_cast< const QgsPoint * >( ddPoint.constGet() )->x();
2293  yPos = static_cast< const QgsPoint * >( ddPoint.constGet() )->y();
2294  }
2295 
2296  xPos += xdiff;
2297  yPos += ydiff;
2298  }
2299  else
2300  {
2301  // only rotate non-pinned OverPoint placements until other placements are supported in pal::Feature
2302  if ( dataDefinedRotation && placement != QgsPalLayerSettings::OverPoint )
2303  {
2304  angle = 0.0;
2305  }
2306  }
2307  }
2308  }
2309  }
2310  }
2311 
2312  // data defined always show?
2313  bool alwaysShow = false;
2314  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::AlwaysShow ) )
2315  {
2316  alwaysShow = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::AlwaysShow, context.expressionContext(), false );
2317  }
2318 
2319  // set repeat distance
2320  // data defined repeat distance?
2321  double repeatDist = repeatDistance;
2322  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::RepeatDistance ) )
2323  {
2324  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( repeatDist );
2325  repeatDist = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::RepeatDistance, context.expressionContext(), repeatDist );
2326  }
2327 
2328  // data defined label-repeat distance units?
2329  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit repeatUnits = repeatDistanceUnit;
2330  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::RepeatDistanceUnit ) )
2331  {
2332  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::RepeatDistanceUnit, context.expressionContext() );
2333  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2334  {
2335  QString units = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2336  if ( !units.isEmpty() )
2337  {
2338  bool ok = false;
2339  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit decodedUnits = QgsUnitTypes::decodeRenderUnit( units, &ok );
2340  if ( ok )
2341  {
2342  repeatUnits = decodedUnits;
2343  }
2344  }
2345  }
2346  }
2347 
2348  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( repeatDist, 0.0 ) )
2349  {
2350  if ( repeatUnits != QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnits )
2351  {
2352  repeatDist = context.convertToMapUnits( repeatDist, repeatUnits, repeatDistanceMapUnitScale );
2353  }
2354  }
2355 
2356  // data defined overrun distance
2357  double overrunDistanceEval = overrunDistance;
2358  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::OverrunDistance ) )
2359  {
2360  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( overrunDistanceEval );
2361  overrunDistanceEval = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::OverrunDistance, context.expressionContext(), overrunDistanceEval );
2362  }
2363  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( overrunDistanceEval, 0.0 ) )
2364  {
2365  overrunDistanceEval = context.convertToMapUnits( overrunDistanceEval, overrunDistanceUnit, overrunDistanceMapUnitScale );
2366  }
2367 
2368  // we smooth out the overrun label extensions by 1 mm, to avoid little jaggies right at the start or end of the lines
2369  // causing the overrun extension to extend out in an undesirable direction. This is hard coded, we don't want to overload
2370  // users with options they likely don't need to see...
2371  const double overrunSmoothDist = context.convertToMapUnits( 1, QgsUnitTypes::RenderMillimeters );
2372 
2373  bool labelAll = labelPerPart && !dataDefinedPosition;
2374  if ( !dataDefinedPosition )
2375  {
2376  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::LabelAllParts ) )
2377  {
2378  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( labelPerPart );
2379  labelAll = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::LabelAllParts, context.expressionContext(), labelPerPart );
2380  }
2381  }
2382 
2383  // feature to the layer
2384  QgsTextLabelFeature *lf = new QgsTextLabelFeature( feature.id(), std::move( geos_geom_clone ), QSizeF( labelX, labelY ) );
2385  lf->setFeature( feature );
2386  lf->setSymbol( symbol );
2387  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( rotatedLabelX, 0.0 ) && !qgsDoubleNear( rotatedLabelY, 0.0 ) )
2388  lf->setRotatedSize( QSizeF( rotatedLabelX, rotatedLabelY ) );
2389  mFeatsRegPal++;
2390 
2391  *labelFeature = lf;
2392  ( *labelFeature )->setHasFixedPosition( dataDefinedPosition );
2393  ( *labelFeature )->setFixedPosition( QgsPointXY( xPos, yPos ) );
2394  // use layer-level defined rotation, but not if position fixed
2395  ( *labelFeature )->setHasFixedAngle( dataDefinedRotation || ( !dataDefinedPosition && !qgsDoubleNear( angle, 0.0 ) ) );
2396  ( *labelFeature )->setFixedAngle( angle );
2397  ( *labelFeature )->setQuadOffset( QPointF( quadOffsetX, quadOffsetY ) );
2398  ( *labelFeature )->setPositionOffset( QgsPointXY( offsetX, offsetY ) );
2399  ( *labelFeature )->setOffsetType( offsetType );
2400  ( *labelFeature )->setAlwaysShow( alwaysShow );
2401  ( *labelFeature )->setRepeatDistance( repeatDist );
2402  ( *labelFeature )->setLabelText( labelText );
2403  ( *labelFeature )->setPermissibleZone( permissibleZone );
2404  ( *labelFeature )->setOverrunDistance( overrunDistanceEval );
2405  ( *labelFeature )->setOverrunSmoothDistance( overrunSmoothDist );
2406  ( *labelFeature )->setLabelAllParts( labelAll );
2407  if ( geosObstacleGeomClone )
2408  {
2409  ( *labelFeature )->setObstacleGeometry( std::move( geosObstacleGeomClone ) );
2410 
2411  if ( geom.type() == QgsWkbTypes::PointGeometry )
2412  {
2413  //register symbol size
2414  ( *labelFeature )->setSymbolSize( QSizeF( obstacleGeometry.boundingBox().width(),
2415  obstacleGeometry.boundingBox().height() ) );
2416  }
2417  }
2418 
2419  //set label's visual margin so that top visual margin is the leading, and bottom margin is the font's descent
2420  //this makes labels align to the font's baseline or highest character
2421  double topMargin = std::max( 0.25 * labelFontMetrics->ascent(), 0.0 );
2422  double bottomMargin = 1.0 + labelFontMetrics->descent();
2423  QgsMargins vm( 0.0, topMargin, 0.0, bottomMargin );
2424  vm *= xform->mapUnitsPerPixel();
2425  ( *labelFeature )->setVisualMargin( vm );
2426 
2427  // store the label's calculated font for later use during painting
2428  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "PAL font stored definedFont: %1, Style: %2" ).arg( labelFont.toString(), labelFont.styleName() ), 4 );
2429  lf->setDefinedFont( labelFont );
2430 
2431  // TODO: only for placement which needs character info
2432  // account for any data defined font metrics adjustments
2433  lf->calculateInfo( placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::Curved || placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::PerimeterCurved,
2434  labelFontMetrics.get(), xform, maxcharanglein, maxcharangleout );
2435  // for labelFeature the LabelInfo is passed to feat when it is registered
2436 
2437  // TODO: allow layer-wide feature dist in PAL...?
2438 
2439  // data defined label-feature distance?
2440  double distance = dist;
2441  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::LabelDistance ) )
2442  {
2443  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( distance );
2444  distance = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::LabelDistance, context.expressionContext(), distance );
2445  }
2446 
2447  // data defined label-feature distance units?
2448  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit distUnit = distUnits;
2449  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::DistanceUnits ) )
2450  {
2451  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DistanceUnits, context.expressionContext() );
2452  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2453  {
2454  QString units = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2455  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal DistanceUnits:%1" ).arg( units ), 4 );
2456  if ( !units.isEmpty() )
2457  {
2458  bool ok = false;
2459  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit decodedUnits = QgsUnitTypes::decodeRenderUnit( units, &ok );
2460  if ( ok )
2461  {
2462  distUnit = decodedUnits;
2463  }
2464  }
2465  }
2466  }
2467  distance = context.convertToPainterUnits( distance, distUnit, distMapUnitScale );
2468 
2469  // when using certain placement modes, we force a tiny minimum distance. This ensures that
2470  // candidates are created just offset from a border and avoids candidates being incorrectly flagged as colliding with neighbours
2471  if ( placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::Line || placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::Curved || placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::PerimeterCurved )
2472  {
2473  distance = ( distance < 0 ? -1 : 1 ) * std::max( std::fabs( distance ), 1.0 );
2474  }
2475 
2476  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( distance, 0.0 ) )
2477  {
2478  double d = ptOne.distance( ptZero ) * distance;
2479  ( *labelFeature )->setDistLabel( d );
2480  }
2481 
2482  if ( ddFixedQuad )
2483  {
2484  ( *labelFeature )->setHasFixedQuadrant( true );
2485  }
2486 
2487  pal::LineArrangementFlags featureArrangementFlags = static_cast< pal::LineArrangementFlags >( placementFlags );
2488  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::LinePlacementOptions ) )
2489  {
2490  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( QgsLabelingUtils::encodeLinePlacementFlags( featureArrangementFlags ) );
2491  const QString dataDefinedLineArrangement = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsString( QgsPalLayerSettings::LinePlacementOptions, context.expressionContext() );
2492  if ( !dataDefinedLineArrangement.isEmpty() )
2493  {
2494  featureArrangementFlags = QgsLabelingUtils::decodeLinePlacementFlags( dataDefinedLineArrangement );
2495  }
2496  }
2497  ( *labelFeature )->setArrangementFlags( featureArrangementFlags );
2498 
2499  // data defined z-index?
2500  double z = zIndex;
2501  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::ZIndex ) )
2502  {
2503  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( z );
2504  z = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::ZIndex, context.expressionContext(), z );
2505  }
2506  ( *labelFeature )->setZIndex( z );
2507 
2508  // data defined priority?
2509  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Priority ) )
2510  {
2511  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( priority );
2512  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::Priority, context.expressionContext() );
2513  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2514  {
2515  bool ok;
2516  double priorityD = exprVal.toDouble( &ok );
2517  if ( ok )
2518  {
2519  priorityD = qBound( 0.0, priorityD, 10.0 );
2520  priorityD = 1 - priorityD / 10.0; // convert 0..10 --> 1..0
2521  ( *labelFeature )->setPriority( priorityD );
2522  }
2523  }
2524  }
2525 
2526  ( *labelFeature )->setIsObstacle( isObstacle );
2527 
2528  double featObstacleFactor = obstacleFactor;
2529  if ( isObstacle && mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::ObstacleFactor ) )
2530  {
2531  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( featObstacleFactor );
2532  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::ObstacleFactor, context.expressionContext() );
2533  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2534  {
2535  bool ok;
2536  double factorD = exprVal.toDouble( &ok );
2537  if ( ok )
2538  {
2539  factorD = qBound( 0.0, factorD, 10.0 );
2540  factorD = factorD / 5.0 + 0.0001; // convert 0 -> 10 to 0.0001 -> 2.0
2541  featObstacleFactor = factorD;
2542  }
2543  }
2544  }
2545  ( *labelFeature )->setObstacleFactor( featObstacleFactor );
2546 
2547  QVector< QgsPalLayerSettings::PredefinedPointPosition > positionOrder = predefinedPositionOrder;
2548  if ( positionOrder.isEmpty() )
2549  positionOrder = QgsPalLayerSettings::DEFAULT_PLACEMENT_ORDER;
2550 
2551  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::PredefinedPositionOrder ) )
2552  {
2553  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( QgsLabelingUtils::encodePredefinedPositionOrder( predefinedPositionOrder ) );
2554  QString dataDefinedOrder = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsString( QgsPalLayerSettings::PredefinedPositionOrder, context.expressionContext() );
2555  if ( !dataDefinedOrder.isEmpty() )
2556  {
2557  positionOrder = QgsLabelingUtils::decodePredefinedPositionOrder( dataDefinedOrder );
2558  }
2559  }
2560  ( *labelFeature )->setPredefinedPositionOrder( positionOrder );
2561 
2562  // add parameters for data defined labeling to label feature
2563  lf->setDataDefinedValues( dataDefinedValues );
2564 }

2566 void QgsPalLayerSettings::registerObstacleFeature( const QgsFeature &f, QgsRenderContext &context, QgsLabelFeature **obstacleFeature, const QgsGeometry &obstacleGeometry )
2567 {
2568  mCurFeat = &f;
2569 
2570  QgsGeometry geom;
2571  if ( !obstacleGeometry.isNull() )
2572  {
2573  geom = obstacleGeometry;
2574  }
2575  else
2576  {
2577  geom = f.geometry();
2578  }
2579 
2580  if ( geom.isNull() )
2581  {
2582  return;
2583  }
2584 
2585  // simplify?
2586  const QgsVectorSimplifyMethod &simplifyMethod = context.vectorSimplifyMethod();
2587  std::unique_ptr<QgsGeometry> scopedClonedGeom;
2588  if ( simplifyMethod.simplifyHints() != QgsVectorSimplifyMethod::NoSimplification && simplifyMethod.forceLocalOptimization() )
2589  {
2590  int simplifyHints = simplifyMethod.simplifyHints() | QgsMapToPixelSimplifier::SimplifyEnvelope;
2591  QgsMapToPixelSimplifier::SimplifyAlgorithm simplifyAlgorithm = static_cast< QgsMapToPixelSimplifier::SimplifyAlgorithm >( simplifyMethod.simplifyAlgorithm() );
2592  QgsMapToPixelSimplifier simplifier( simplifyHints, simplifyMethod.tolerance(), simplifyAlgorithm );
2593  geom = simplifier.simplify( geom );
2594  }
2595 
2596  geos::unique_ptr geos_geom_clone;
2597  std::unique_ptr<QgsGeometry> scopedPreparedGeom;
2598 
2599  if ( QgsPalLabeling::geometryRequiresPreparation( geom, context, ct, extentGeom, mergeLines ) )
2600  {
2601  geom = QgsPalLabeling::prepareGeometry( geom, context, ct, extentGeom, mergeLines );
2602  }
2603  geos_geom_clone = QgsGeos::asGeos( geom );
2604 
2605  if ( !geos_geom_clone )
2606  return; // invalid geometry
2607 
2608  // feature to the layer
2609  *obstacleFeature = new QgsLabelFeature( f.id(), std::move( geos_geom_clone ), QSizeF( 0, 0 ) );
2610  ( *obstacleFeature )->setIsObstacle( true );
2611  ( *obstacleFeature )->setFeature( f );
2612  mFeatsRegPal++;
2613 }

2615 bool QgsPalLayerSettings::dataDefinedValEval( DataDefinedValueType valType,
2616  QgsPalLayerSettings::Property p,
2617  QVariant &exprVal, QgsExpressionContext &context, const QVariant &originalValue )
2618 {
2619  if ( !mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( p ) )
2620  return false;
2621 
2622  context.setOriginalValueVariable( originalValue );
2623  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( p, context );
2624  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2625  {
2626  switch ( valType )
2627  {
2628  case DDBool:
2629  {
2630  bool bol = exprVal.toBool();
2631  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( bol ) );
2632  return true;
2633  }
2634  case DDInt:
2635  {
2636  bool ok;
2637  int size = exprVal.toInt( &ok );
2638 
2639  if ( ok )
2640  {
2641  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( size ) );
2642  return true;
2643  }
2644  return false;
2645  }
2646  case DDIntPos:
2647  {
2648  bool ok;
2649  int size = exprVal.toInt( &ok );
2650 
2651  if ( ok && size > 0 )
2652  {
2653  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( size ) );
2654  return true;
2655  }
2656  return false;
2657  }
2658  case DDDouble:
2659  {
2660  bool ok;
2661  double size = exprVal.toDouble( &ok );
2662 
2663  if ( ok )
2664  {
2665  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( size ) );
2666  return true;
2667  }
2668  return false;
2669  }
2670  case DDDoublePos:
2671  {
2672  bool ok;
2673  double size = exprVal.toDouble( &ok );
2674 
2675  if ( ok && size > 0.0 )
2676  {
2677  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( size ) );
2678  return true;
2679  }
2680  return false;
2681  }
2682  case DDRotation180:
2683  {
2684  bool ok;
2685  double rot = exprVal.toDouble( &ok );
2686  if ( ok )
2687  {
2688  if ( rot < -180.0 && rot >= -360 )
2689  {
2690  rot += 360;
2691  }
2692  if ( rot > 180.0 && rot <= 360 )
2693  {
2694  rot -= 360;
2695  }
2696  if ( rot >= -180 && rot <= 180 )
2697  {
2698  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( rot ) );
2699  return true;
2700  }
2701  }
2702  return false;
2703  }
2704  case DDOpacity:
2705  {
2706  bool ok;
2707  int size = exprVal.toInt( &ok );
2708  if ( ok && size >= 0 && size <= 100 )
2709  {
2710  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( size ) );
2711  return true;
2712  }
2713  return false;
2714  }
2715  case DDString:
2716  {
2717  QString str = exprVal.toString(); // don't trim whitespace
2718 
2719  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( str ) ); // let it stay empty if it is
2720  return true;
2721  }
2722  case DDUnits:
2723  {
2724  QString unitstr = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2725 
2726  if ( !unitstr.isEmpty() )
2727  {
2728  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( static_cast< int >( QgsUnitTypes::decodeRenderUnit( unitstr ) ) ) );
2729  return true;
2730  }
2731  return false;
2732  }
2733  case DDColor:
2734  {
2735  QString colorstr = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2736  QColor color = QgsSymbolLayerUtils::decodeColor( colorstr );
2737 
2738  if ( color.isValid() )
2739  {
2740  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( color ) );
2741  return true;
2742  }
2743  return false;
2744  }
2745  case DDJoinStyle:
2746  {
2747  QString joinstr = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2748 
2749  if ( !joinstr.isEmpty() )
2750  {
2751  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( static_cast< int >( QgsSymbolLayerUtils::decodePenJoinStyle( joinstr ) ) ) );
2752  return true;
2753  }
2754  return false;
2755  }
2756  case DDBlendMode:
2757  {
2758  QString blendstr = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2759 
2760  if ( !blendstr.isEmpty() )
2761  {
2762  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, QVariant( static_cast< int >( QgsSymbolLayerUtils::decodeBlendMode( blendstr ) ) ) );
2763  return true;
2764  }
2765  return false;
2766  }
2767  case DDPointF:
2768  {
2769  bool ok = false;
2770  const QPointF res = QgsSymbolLayerUtils::toPoint( exprVal, &ok );
2771  if ( ok )
2772  {
2773  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, res );
2774  return true;
2775  }
2776  return false;
2777  }
2778  case DDSizeF:
2779  {
2780  bool ok = false;
2781  const QSizeF res = QgsSymbolLayerUtils::toSize( exprVal, &ok );
2782  if ( ok )
2783  {
2784  dataDefinedValues.insert( p, res );
2785  return true;
2786  }
2787  return false;
2788  }
2789  }
2790  }
2791  return false;
2792 }

2794 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseTextStyle( QFont &labelFont,
2795  QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnit fontunits,
2796  QgsRenderContext &context )
2797 {
2798  // NOTE: labelFont already has pixelSize set, so pointSize or pointSizeF might return -1
2799 
2800  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
2801 
2802  // Two ways to generate new data defined font:
2803  // 1) Family + [bold] + [italic] (named style is ignored and font is built off of base family)
2804  // 2) Family + named style (bold or italic is ignored)
2805 
2806  // data defined font family?
2807  QString ddFontFamily;
2808  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Family ) )
2809  {
2810  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( labelFont.family() );
2811  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::Family, context.expressionContext() );
2812  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2813  {
2814  QString family = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2815  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal Font family:%1" ).arg( family ), 4 );
2816 
2817  if ( labelFont.family() != family )
2818  {
2819  // testing for ddFontFamily in QFontDatabase.families() may be slow to do for every feature
2820  // (i.e. don't use QgsFontUtils::fontFamilyMatchOnSystem( family ) here)
2821  if ( QgsFontUtils::fontFamilyOnSystem( family ) )
2822  {
2823  ddFontFamily = family;
2824  }
2825  }
2826  }
2827  }
2828 
2829  // data defined named font style?
2830  QString ddFontStyle;
2831  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontStyle ) )
2832  {
2833  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontStyle, context.expressionContext() );
2834  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
2835  {
2836  QString fontstyle = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2837  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal Font style:%1" ).arg( fontstyle ), 4 );
2838  ddFontStyle = fontstyle;
2839  }
2840  }
2841 
2842  // data defined bold font style?
2843  bool ddBold = false;
2844  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Bold ) )
2845  {
2846  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( labelFont.bold() );
2847  ddBold = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::Bold, context.expressionContext(), false );
2848  }
2849 
2850  // data defined italic font style?
2851  bool ddItalic = false;
2852  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Italic ) )
2853  {
2854  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( labelFont.italic() );
2855  ddItalic = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::Italic, context.expressionContext(), false );
2856  }
2857 
2858  // TODO: update when pref for how to resolve missing family (use matching algorithm or just default font) is implemented
2859  // (currently defaults to what has been read in from layer settings)
2860  QFont newFont;
2861  QFont appFont = QApplication::font();
2862  bool newFontBuilt = false;
2863  if ( ddBold || ddItalic )
2864  {
2865  // new font needs built, since existing style needs removed
2866  newFont = QFont( !ddFontFamily.isEmpty() ? ddFontFamily : labelFont.family() );
2867  newFontBuilt = true;
2868  newFont.setBold( ddBold );
2869  newFont.setItalic( ddItalic );
2870  }
2871  else if ( !ddFontStyle.isEmpty()
2872  && ddFontStyle.compare( QLatin1String( "Ignore" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) != 0 )
2873  {
2874  if ( !ddFontFamily.isEmpty() )
2875  {
2876  // both family and style are different, build font from database
2877  QFont styledfont = mFontDB.font( ddFontFamily, ddFontStyle, appFont.pointSize() );
2878  if ( appFont != styledfont )
2879  {
2880  newFont = styledfont;
2881  newFontBuilt = true;
2882  }
2883  }
2884 
2885  // update the font face style
2886  QgsFontUtils::updateFontViaStyle( newFontBuilt ? newFont : labelFont, ddFontStyle );
2887  }
2888  else if ( !ddFontFamily.isEmpty() )
2889  {
2890  if ( ddFontStyle.compare( QLatin1String( "Ignore" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) != 0 )
2891  {
2892  // just family is different, build font from database
2893  QFont styledfont = mFontDB.font( ddFontFamily, mFormat.namedStyle(), appFont.pointSize() );
2894  if ( appFont != styledfont )
2895  {
2896  newFont = styledfont;
2897  newFontBuilt = true;
2898  }
2899  }
2900  else
2901  {
2902  newFont = QFont( ddFontFamily );
2903  newFontBuilt = true;
2904  }
2905  }
2906 
2907  if ( newFontBuilt )
2908  {
2909  // copy over existing font settings
2910  //newFont = newFont.resolve( labelFont ); // should work, but let's be sure what's being copied
2911  newFont.setPixelSize( labelFont.pixelSize() );
2912  newFont.setUnderline( labelFont.underline() );
2913  newFont.setStrikeOut( labelFont.strikeOut() );
2914  newFont.setWordSpacing( labelFont.wordSpacing() );
2915  newFont.setLetterSpacing( QFont::AbsoluteSpacing, labelFont.letterSpacing() );
2916 
2917  labelFont = newFont;
2918  }
2919 
2920  // data defined word spacing?
2921  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontWordSpacing ) )
2922  {
2923  double wordspace = labelFont.wordSpacing();
2924  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( wordspace );
2925  wordspace = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontWordSpacing, context.expressionContext(), wordspace );
2926  labelFont.setWordSpacing( context.convertToPainterUnits( wordspace, fontunits, mFormat.sizeMapUnitScale() ) );
2927  }
2928 
2929  // data defined letter spacing?
2930  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontLetterSpacing ) )
2931  {
2932  double letterspace = labelFont.letterSpacing();
2933  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( letterspace );
2934  letterspace = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsDouble( QgsPalLayerSettings::FontLetterSpacing, context.expressionContext(), letterspace );
2935  labelFont.setLetterSpacing( QFont::AbsoluteSpacing, context.convertToPainterUnits( letterspace, fontunits, mFormat.sizeMapUnitScale() ) );
2936  }
2937 
2938  // data defined strikeout font style?
2939  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Strikeout ) )
2940  {
2941  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( labelFont.strikeOut() );
2942  bool strikeout = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::Strikeout, context.expressionContext(), false );
2943  labelFont.setStrikeOut( strikeout );
2944  }
2945 
2946  // data defined underline font style?
2947  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::Underline ) )
2948  {
2949  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( labelFont.underline() );
2950  bool underline = mDataDefinedProperties.valueAsBool( QgsPalLayerSettings::Underline, context.expressionContext(), false );
2951  labelFont.setUnderline( underline );
2952  }
2953 
2954  // pass the rest on to QgsPalLabeling::drawLabeling
2955 
2956  // data defined font color?
2957  dataDefinedValEval( DDColor, QgsPalLayerSettings::Color, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), QgsSymbolLayerUtils::encodeColor( mFormat.color() ) );
2958 
2959  // data defined font opacity?
2960  dataDefinedValEval( DDOpacity, QgsPalLayerSettings::FontOpacity, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), mFormat.opacity() * 100 );
2961 
2962  // data defined font blend mode?
2963  dataDefinedValEval( DDBlendMode, QgsPalLayerSettings::FontBlendMode, exprVal, context.expressionContext() );
2964 
2965 }

2967 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseTextBuffer( QgsRenderContext &context )
2968 {
2969  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
2970 
2971  QgsTextBufferSettings buffer = mFormat.buffer();
2972 
2973  // data defined draw buffer?
2974  bool drawBuffer = mFormat.buffer().enabled();
2975  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDBool, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferDraw, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), buffer.enabled() ) )
2976  {
2977  drawBuffer = exprVal.toBool();
2978  }
2979 
2980  if ( !drawBuffer )
2981  {
2982  return;
2983  }
2984 
2985  // data defined buffer size?
2986  double bufrSize = buffer.size();
2987  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDDoublePos, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferSize, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), buffer.size() ) )
2988  {
2989  bufrSize = exprVal.toDouble();
2990  }
2991 
2992  // data defined buffer transparency?
2993  double bufferOpacity = buffer.opacity() * 100;
2994  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDOpacity, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferOpacity, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), bufferOpacity ) )
2995  {
2996  bufferOpacity = exprVal.toDouble();
2997  }
2998 
2999  drawBuffer = ( drawBuffer && bufrSize > 0.0 && bufferOpacity > 0 );
3000 
3001  if ( !drawBuffer )
3002  {
3003  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferDraw, QVariant( false ) ); // trigger value
3004  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferSize );
3005  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferOpacity );
3006  return; // don't bother evaluating values that won't be used
3007  }
3008 
3009  // data defined buffer units?
3010  dataDefinedValEval( DDUnits, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferUnit, exprVal, context.expressionContext() );
3011 
3012  // data defined buffer color?
3013  dataDefinedValEval( DDColor, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferColor, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), QgsSymbolLayerUtils::encodeColor( buffer.color() ) );
3014 
3015  // data defined buffer pen join style?
3016  dataDefinedValEval( DDJoinStyle, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferJoinStyle, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), QgsSymbolLayerUtils::encodePenJoinStyle( buffer.joinStyle() ) );
3017 
3018  // data defined buffer blend mode?
3019  dataDefinedValEval( DDBlendMode, QgsPalLayerSettings::BufferBlendMode, exprVal, context.expressionContext() );
3020 }

3022 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseTextFormatting( QgsRenderContext &context )
3023 {
3024  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
3025 
3026  // data defined multiline wrap character?
3027  QString wrapchr = wrapChar;
3028  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDString, QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineWrapChar, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), wrapChar ) )
3029  {
3030  wrapchr = exprVal.toString();
3031  }
3032 
3033  int evalAutoWrapLength = autoWrapLength;
3034  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDInt, QgsPalLayerSettings::AutoWrapLength, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), evalAutoWrapLength ) )
3035  {
3036  evalAutoWrapLength = exprVal.toInt();
3037  }
3038 
3039  // data defined multiline height?
3040  dataDefinedValEval( DDDouble, QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineHeight, exprVal, context.expressionContext() );
3041 
3042  // data defined multiline text align?
3043  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlignment ) )
3044  {
3045  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( mFormat.lineHeight() );
3046  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlignment, context.expressionContext() );
3047  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
3048  {
3049  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
3050  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal MultiLineAlignment:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
3051 
3052  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
3053  {
3054  // "Left"
3055  QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlign aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLeft;
3056 
3057  if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Center" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3058  {
3059  aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiCenter;
3060  }
3061  else if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Right" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3062  {
3063  aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiRight;
3064  }
3065  else if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Follow" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3066  {
3067  aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiFollowPlacement;
3068  }
3069  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlignment, QVariant( static_cast< int >( aligntype ) ) );
3070  }
3071  }
3072  }
3073 
3074  // text orientation
3075  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation ) )
3076  {
3077  const QString encoded = QgsTextRendererUtils::encodeTextOrientation( mFormat.orientation() );
3078  context.expressionContext().setOriginalValueVariable( encoded );
3079  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation, context.expressionContext() );
3080  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
3081  {
3082  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
3083  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
3084  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::TextOrientation, str );
3085  }
3086  }
3087 
3088  // data defined direction symbol?
3089  bool drawDirSymb = addDirectionSymbol;
3090  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDBool, QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbDraw, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), addDirectionSymbol ) )
3091  {
3092  drawDirSymb = exprVal.toBool();
3093  }
3094 
3095  if ( drawDirSymb )
3096  {
3097  // data defined direction left symbol?
3098  dataDefinedValEval( DDString, QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbLeft, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), leftDirectionSymbol );
3099 
3100  // data defined direction right symbol?
3101  dataDefinedValEval( DDString, QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbRight, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), rightDirectionSymbol );
3102 
3103  // data defined direction symbol placement?
3104  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement, context.expressionContext() );
3105  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
3106  {
3107  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
3108  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal DirSymbPlacement:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
3109 
3110  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
3111  {
3112  // "LeftRight"
3113  QgsPalLayerSettings::DirectionSymbols placetype = QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolLeftRight;
3114 
3115  if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Above" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3116  {
3117  placetype = QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolAbove;
3118  }
3119  else if ( str.compare( QLatin1String( "Below" ), Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3120  {
3121  placetype = QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolBelow;
3122  }
3123  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement, QVariant( static_cast< int >( placetype ) ) );
3124  }
3125  }
3126 
3127  // data defined direction symbol reversed?
3128  dataDefinedValEval( DDBool, QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbReverse, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), reverseDirectionSymbol );
3129  }
3130

3132 }

3134 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseShapeBackground( QgsRenderContext &context )
3135 {
3136  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
3137 
3138  QgsTextBackgroundSettings background = mFormat.background();
3139 
3140  // data defined draw shape?
3141  bool drawShape = background.enabled();
3142  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDBool, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeDraw, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), drawShape ) )
3143  {
3144  drawShape = exprVal.toBool();
3145  }
3146 
3147  if ( !drawShape )
3148  {
3149  return;
3150  }
3151

3154  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDOpacity, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeOpacity, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shapeOpacity ) )
3155  {
3156  shapeOpacity = 100.0 * exprVal.toDouble();

3160

3164  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeOpacity );

3205  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isActive( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeType ) )

3238  && ( svgPath.isEmpty()
3239  || ( !svgPath.isEmpty()
3240  && shpSizeType == QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizeFixed

3247  || ( background.markerSymbol()

3249  && ddShpSizeX == 0.0 ) ) )
3250  {

3328 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseDropShadow( QgsRenderContext &context )
3329 {
3330  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
3331 
3332  QgsTextShadowSettings shadow = mFormat.shadow();
3333 
3334  // data defined draw shadow?
3335  bool drawShadow = shadow.enabled();
3336  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDBool, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowDraw, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), drawShadow ) )
3337  {
3338  drawShadow = exprVal.toBool();
3339  }
3340 
3341  if ( !drawShadow )
3342  {
3343  return;
3344  }
3345 
3346  // data defined shadow transparency?
3347  double shadowOpacity = shadow.opacity() * 100;
3348  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDOpacity, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOpacity, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shadowOpacity ) )
3349  {
3350  shadowOpacity = exprVal.toDouble();
3351  }
3352 
3353  // data defined shadow offset distance?
3354  double shadowOffDist = shadow.offsetDistance();
3355  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDDoublePos, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetDist, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shadowOffDist ) )
3356  {
3357  shadowOffDist = exprVal.toDouble();

3359 
3360  // data defined shadow offset distance?
3361  double shadowRad = shadow.blurRadius();
3362  if ( dataDefinedValEval( DDDoublePos, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadius, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shadowRad ) )
3363  {
3364  shadowRad = exprVal.toDouble();
3365  }
3366

3368 
3369  if ( !drawShadow )
3370  {
3371  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowDraw, QVariant( false ) ); // trigger value
3372  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOpacity );
3373  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetDist );
3374  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadius );

3380  {
3381  exprVal = mDataDefinedProperties.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowUnder, context.expressionContext() );
3382  if ( exprVal.isValid() )
3383  {
3384  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
3385  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "exprVal ShadowUnder:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
3386 
3387  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
3388  {
3389  QgsTextShadowSettings::ShadowPlacement shdwtype = QgsTextRendererUtils::decodeShadowPlacementType( str );
3390  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowUnder, QVariant( static_cast< int >( shdwtype ) ) );
3391  }
3392  }
3393  }
3394 
3395  // data defined shadow offset angle?
3396  dataDefinedValEval( DDRotation180, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetAngle, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shadow.offsetAngle() );
3397 
3398  // data defined shadow offset units?
3399  dataDefinedValEval( DDUnits, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetUnits, exprVal, context.expressionContext() );
3400

3402  dataDefinedValEval( DDDouble, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadius, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shadow.blurRadius() );
3403 
3404  // data defined shadow radius units?
3405  dataDefinedValEval( DDUnits, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadiusUnits, exprVal, context.expressionContext() );
3406

3408  dataDefinedValEval( DDIntPos, QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowScale, exprVal, context.expressionContext(), shadow.scale() );

3426 bool QgsPalLabeling::geometryRequiresPreparation( const QgsGeometry &geometry, QgsRenderContext &context, const QgsCoordinateTransform &ct, const QgsGeometry &clipGeometry, bool mergeLines )
3427 {
3428  if ( geometry.isNull() )
3429  {
3430  return false;
3431  }
3432 
3433  if ( geometry.type() == QgsWkbTypes::LineGeometry && geometry.isMultipart() && mergeLines )
3434  {
3435  return true;
3436  }
3437 
3438  //requires reprojection
3439  if ( ct.isValid() && !ct.isShortCircuited() )
3440  return true;
3441 
3442  //requires rotation
3443  const QgsMapToPixel &m2p = context.mapToPixel();
3444  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( m2p.mapRotation(), 0 ) )
3445  return true;
3446 
3447  //requires clip
3448  if ( !clipGeometry.isNull() && !clipGeometry.boundingBox().contains( geometry.boundingBox() ) )
3449  return true;
3450 
3451  //requires fixing
3452  if ( geometry.type() == QgsWkbTypes::PolygonGeometry && !geometry.isGeosValid() )
3453  return true;
3454 
3455  return false;
3456 }
3457 
3458 QStringList QgsPalLabeling::splitToLines( const QString &text, const QString &wrapCharacter, const int autoWrapLength, const bool useMaxLineLengthWhenAutoWrapping )
3459 {
3460  QStringList multiLineSplit;
3461  if ( !wrapCharacter.isEmpty() && wrapCharacter != QLatin1String( "\n" ) )
3462  {
3463  //wrap on both the wrapchr and new line characters
3464  const QStringList lines = text.split( wrapCharacter );
3465  for ( const QString &line : lines )
3466  {
3467  multiLineSplit.append( line.split( '\n' ) );
3468  }
3469  }
3470  else
3471  {
3472  multiLineSplit = text.split( '\n' );
3473  }
3474 
3475  // apply auto wrapping to each manually created line
3476  if ( autoWrapLength != 0 )
3477  {
3478  QStringList autoWrappedLines;
3479  autoWrappedLines.reserve( multiLineSplit.count() );
3480  for ( const QString &line : qgis::as_const( multiLineSplit ) )
3481  {
3482  autoWrappedLines.append( QgsStringUtils::wordWrap( line, autoWrapLength, useMaxLineLengthWhenAutoWrapping ).split( '\n' ) );
3483  }
3484  multiLineSplit = autoWrappedLines;
3485  }
3486  return multiLineSplit;
3487 }
3488 
3489 QStringList QgsPalLabeling::splitToGraphemes( const QString &text )
3490 {
3491  QStringList graphemes;
3492  QTextBoundaryFinder boundaryFinder( QTextBoundaryFinder::Grapheme, text );
3493  int currentBoundary = -1;
3494  int previousBoundary = 0;
3495  while ( ( currentBoundary = boundaryFinder.toNextBoundary() ) > 0 )
3496  {
3497  graphemes << text.mid( previousBoundary, currentBoundary - previousBoundary );
3498  previousBoundary = currentBoundary;
3499  }
3500  return graphemes;
3501 }
3502 
3503 QgsGeometry QgsPalLabeling::prepareGeometry( const QgsGeometry &geometry, QgsRenderContext &context, const QgsCoordinateTransform &ct, const QgsGeometry &clipGeometry, bool mergeLines )
3504 {
3505  if ( geometry.isNull() )
3506  {
3507  return QgsGeometry();
3508  }
3509 
3510  //don't modify the feature's geometry so that geometry based expressions keep working
3511  QgsGeometry geom = geometry;
3512 
3513  if ( geom.type() == QgsWkbTypes::LineGeometry && geom.isMultipart() && mergeLines )
3514  {
3515  geom = geom.mergeLines();
3516  }
3517 
3518  //reproject the geometry if necessary
3519  if ( ct.isValid() && !ct.isShortCircuited() )
3520  {
3521  try
3522  {
3523  geom.transform( ct );
3524  }
3525  catch ( QgsCsException &cse )
3526  {
3527  Q_UNUSED( cse )
3528  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QStringLiteral( "Ignoring feature due to transformation exception" ), 4 );
3529  return QgsGeometry();
3530  }
3531  // geometry transforms may result in nan points, remove these
3532  geom.filterVertices( []( const QgsPoint & point )->bool
3533  {
3534  return std::isfinite( point.x() ) && std::isfinite( point.y() );
3535  } );
3536  if ( QgsCurvePolygon *cp = qgsgeometry_cast< QgsCurvePolygon * >( geom.get() ) )
3537  cp->removeInvalidRings();
3538  }
3539 
3540  // Rotate the geometry if needed, before clipping
3541  const QgsMapToPixel &m2p = context.mapToPixel();
3542  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( m2p.mapRotation(), 0 ) )
3543  {
3544  QgsPointXY center = context.mapExtent().center();
3545  if ( geom.rotate( m2p.mapRotation(), center ) )
3546  {
3547  QgsDebugMsg( QStringLiteral( "Error rotating geometry" ).arg( geom.asWkt() ) );
3548  return QgsGeometry();
3549  }
3550  }
3551 
3552  // fix invalid polygons
3553  if ( geom.type() == QgsWkbTypes::PolygonGeometry )
3554  {
3555  if ( geom.isMultipart() )
3556  {
3557  // important -- we need to treat ever part in isolation here. We can't test the validity of the whole geometry
3558  // at once, because touching parts would result in an invalid geometry, and buffering this "dissolves" the parts.
3559  // because the actual label engine treats parts as separate entities, we aren't bound by the usual "touching parts are invalid" rule
3560  // see https://github.com/qgis/QGIS/issues/26763
3561  QVector< QgsGeometry> parts;
3562  parts.reserve( qgsgeometry_cast< const QgsGeometryCollection * >( geom.constGet() )->numGeometries() );
3563  for ( auto it = geom.const_parts_begin(); it != geom.const_parts_end(); ++it )
3564  {
3565  QgsGeometry partGeom( ( *it )->clone() );
3566  if ( !partGeom.isGeosValid() )
3567  {
3568  partGeom = partGeom.buffer( 0, 0 );
3569  }
3570  parts.append( partGeom );
3571  }
3572  geom = QgsGeometry::collectGeometry( parts );
3573  }
3574  else if ( !geom.isGeosValid() )
3575  {
3576  QgsGeometry bufferGeom = geom.buffer( 0, 0 );
3577  if ( bufferGeom.isNull() )
3578  {
3579  QgsDebugMsg( QStringLiteral( "Could not repair geometry: %1" ).arg( bufferGeom.lastError() ) );
3580  return QgsGeometry();
3581  }
3582  geom = bufferGeom;
3583  }
3584  }
3585 
3586  if ( !clipGeometry.isNull() &&
3587  ( ( qgsDoubleNear( m2p.mapRotation(), 0 ) && !clipGeometry.boundingBox().contains( geom.boundingBox() ) )
3588  || ( !qgsDoubleNear( m2p.mapRotation(), 0 ) && !clipGeometry.contains( geom ) ) ) )
3589  {
3590  QgsGeometry clipGeom = geom.intersection( clipGeometry ); // creates new geometry
3591  if ( clipGeom.isNull() )
3592  {
3593  return QgsGeometry();
3594  }
3595  geom = clipGeom;
3596  }
3597 
3598  return geom;
3599 }
3600 
3601 bool QgsPalLabeling::checkMinimumSizeMM( const QgsRenderContext &context, const QgsGeometry &geom, double minSize )
3602 {
3603  if ( minSize <= 0 )
3604  {
3605  return true;
3606  }
3607 
3608  if ( geom.isNull() )
3609  {
3610  return false;
3611  }
3612 
3613  QgsWkbTypes::GeometryType featureType = geom.type();
3614  if ( featureType == QgsWkbTypes::PointGeometry ) //minimum size does not apply to point features
3615  {
3616  return true;
3617  }
3618 
3619  double mapUnitsPerMM = context.mapToPixel().mapUnitsPerPixel() * context.scaleFactor();
3620  if ( featureType == QgsWkbTypes::LineGeometry )
3621  {
3622  double length = geom.length();
3623  if ( length >= 0.0 )
3624  {
3625  return ( length >= ( minSize * mapUnitsPerMM ) );
3626  }
3627  }
3628  else if ( featureType == QgsWkbTypes::PolygonGeometry )
3629  {
3630  double area = geom.area();
3631  if ( area >= 0.0 )
3632  {
3633  return ( std::sqrt( area ) >= ( minSize * mapUnitsPerMM ) );
3634  }
3635  }
3636  return true; //should never be reached. Return true in this case to label such geometries anyway.
3637 }

3640 void QgsPalLabeling::dataDefinedTextStyle( QgsPalLayerSettings &tmpLyr,
3641  const QMap< QgsPalLayerSettings::Property, QVariant > &ddValues )
3642 {
3643  QgsTextFormat format = tmpLyr.format();
3644  bool changed = false;
3645 
3646  //font color
3647  if ( ddValues.contains( QgsPalLayerSettings::Color ) )
3648  {
3649  QVariant ddColor = ddValues.value( QgsPalLayerSettings::Color );

4060 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabelCandidateRect( pal::LabelPosition *lp, QPainter *painter, const QgsMapToPixel *xform, QList<QgsLabelCandidate> *candidates )
4061 {
4062  QgsPointXY outPt = xform->transform( lp->getX(), lp->getY() );
4063 
4064  painter->save();
4065 
4066 #if 0 // TODO: generalize some of this
4067  double w = lp->getWidth();
4068  double h = lp->getHeight();
4069  double cx = lp->getX() + w / 2.0;
4070  double cy = lp->getY() + h / 2.0;
4071  double scale = 1.0 / xform->mapUnitsPerPixel();
4072  double rotation = xform->mapRotation();
4073  double sw = w * scale;
4074  double sh = h * scale;
4075  QRectF rect( -sw / 2, -sh / 2, sw, sh );
4076 
4077  painter->translate( xform->transform( QPointF( cx, cy ) ).toQPointF() );
4078  if ( rotation )
4079  {
4080  // Only if not horizontal
4081  if ( lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_POINT &&
4082  lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_POINT_OVER &&
4083  lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_HORIZ )
4084  {
4085  painter->rotate( rotation );
4086  }
4087  }
4088  painter->translate( rect.bottomLeft() );
4089  painter->rotate( -lp->getAlpha() * 180 / M_PI );
4090  painter->translate( -rect.bottomLeft() );
4091 #else
4092  QgsPointXY outPt2 = xform->transform( lp->getX() + lp->getWidth(), lp->getY() + lp->getHeight() );
4093  QRectF rect( 0, 0, outPt2.x() - outPt.x(), outPt2.y() - outPt.y() );
4094  painter->translate( QPointF( outPt.x(), outPt.y() ) );
4095  painter->rotate( -lp->getAlpha() * 180 / M_PI );
4096 #endif
4097 
4098  if ( lp->conflictsWithObstacle() )
4099  {
4100  painter->setPen( QColor( 255, 0, 0, 64 ) );
4101  }
4102  else
4103  {
4104  painter->setPen( QColor( 0, 0, 0, 64 ) );
4105  }
4106  painter->drawRect( rect );
4107  painter->restore();
4108 
4109  // save the rect
4110  rect.moveTo( outPt.x(), outPt.y() );
4111  if ( candidates )
4112  candidates->append( QgsLabelCandidate( rect, lp->cost() * 1000 ) );
4113 
4114  // show all parts of the multipart label
4115  if ( lp->getNextPart() )
4116  drawLabelCandidateRect( lp->getNextPart(), painter, xform, candidates );
4117 }
